English: It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom). A good education program takes a long time to develop.

d.f: `栽植~`樹木~`需要~`十~`年~，`培養~`人才~`需要~`百年~。`語~`本~《`管子~．`權~`修~》：「`十~`年~`之~`計~，`莫如~`樹木~；`終身之計，莫如樹人~。」`比喻~`培養~`人才~`非常~`不易~`或~`培育~`人才~`是~`長久之計~。`清~．`梁~`章~`鉅~《`楹聯~`叢~`話~．`卷~`五~．`廨宇~》：「`剛日~`讀經~，`柔日~`讀~`史~；`十年樹木，百年樹人~。」

h.p: shí nián shù mù bǎi nián shù rén

English: It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom). A good education program takes a long time to develop.
